main event: A bright reddish-white light was observed passing over Atmore, Alabama on 13 May 1961.
interesting points: The light was visible for approximately 30 to 45 seconds., The sighting involved several observers including Mr. J.D. Howe., The light was described as being rather brilliant and possibly under the fuselage of an aircraft., Atmore is near a heavily traveled jet airway, emphasizing the possibility of aircraft as the source., The investigation concluded the light was likely navigation lights from either commercial or military aircraft.
witness description: Mr. J.D. Howe and several others
